medical_history.chief_complaint: No abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting or change in bowel habits.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began acutely; the patient feels well and healthy. No recollection of events on the day of presentation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, vascular dementia, sarcoidosis, history of alcohol abuse (sober for over ___ years), history of stab injury to the back resulting in right leg weakness and left leg numbness.
medical_history.family_history: Mother with strokes, sister has sarcoidosis, mother with memory problems near death.
medical_history.social_history: History of alcohol abuse, currently sober.
